hero.title: Solar fuel from plastic waste — where no one collects it.
hero.lead: Our small-scale solar pyrolysis system converts non-recyclable plastics into local fuel – an autonomous solution for remote regions lacking waste management and reliable energy supply.

solution.heading: Solution
solution.text: Shredder → Pyrolysis (O₂-free 400–550 °C) → Fractional condensation → Fuel; syngas feeds the heat.

container.heading: Modular container solution
bullets: Solar energy serves as a sustainable and autonomous power source
container.note: The container solution is fully self-sufficient and can be deployed without major infrastructure.

impact.heading: Impact
impact.text: Triple benefit for environment, community and climate.

team.heading: About Us
team.text: Our interdisciplinary team combines expertise in chemical and process engineering, mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, and industrial engineering — complemented by business and environmental perspectives. Together with seasoned advisors, we validate our technology, build prototypes, and test them in the field. Our goal is to spin off a startup that transforms non-recyclable plastics on site into local fuel — technically robust, economically viable, and with measurable impact.
